ing: 1 green chile pepper, seeded and diced
des: "A refreshing Indian salad that is the perfect complement to a curry meal. The peanuts add a wonderful nuttiness to this simple and tasty salad."
ins: In a medium serving bowl, toss together the carrots and peanuts. In a separate bowl, whisk together the lemon juice, salt, sugar, chile pepper and cilantro. Pour over the carrots and stir gently to coat. Serve immediately.
